page.title: 05The Springtime Special
page.content: The{May Fun Day}is usually on the first Saturday in May. The girls from Westbury School do a Maypole Dance. Also the WI do a display.There are a lot of side-shows as well.There are children's races which include a three legged race,skipping and sprinting.A fire engine comes too and you can look round free of charge. The side-shows may vary from year to year but they usually are the following; bottle stall,darts,bowls & guess the number on the Â£5 note. People fix up speakers so you can hear announcements.It makes a great afternoon out.
